body.p: Questions regarding FreeBSD should be addressed to the FreeBSD Questions mailing list, freebsd-questions@FreeBSD.org.
Mailing lists are the primary support channel for FreeBSD users, with numerous mailing lists covering different topic areas. Several non-English mailing lists are also available.
body.h2: Questions about the contents of this WWW server...
body.p: Questions or suggestions about our documentation (Handbook, FAQ, Books & Articles, and so forth) should be addressed to the FreeBSD Documentation Project mailing list, freebsd-doc@FreeBSD.org.
